text: Romeo and Juliet is a 1908 American silent horror movie directed by J. Stuart BlacktonROMEO AND JULIETRomeo and Juliet (A Romantic Story of the Ancient Feud Between the Italian Houses of Montague and Capulet) and stars Paul Panzer, Florence Lawrence, and John G. Adolfi. ==Actors== * Paul Panzer - Romeo * Florence Lawrence - Juliet * John G. Adolfi - Tybalt * Josephine Atkinson - Bit * Louise Carver - Nurse * Charles Chapman - Montague * Gladys Hulette * Charles Kent - Capulet * William V. Ranous - Friar Lawrence * William Shea - Peter * Harry Solter * Florence Turner ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1908 movies Category:American horror movies Category:American silent movies
title: Romeo and Juliet (1908 movie)
